授業方法:
The format and schedule may change during the semester, depending on student needs and the evolving coronavirus situation.

This seminar style class will be conducted either face-to-face (classroom) or online (‘on-demand’ via Edmodo and ‘real time’ via Zoom.) In either case, assignments will be conducted, and lesson resources provided, on Edmodo. As such, students will need access to a computer at home. If classes are online, a Zoom link will be provided here. More information will be provided as soon as possible.

In either case, students will engage in active learning: working individually, in pairs, groups and as a whole class to discuss and examine global issues, develop cross-cultural awareness, and improve academic and language skills through end of unit presentations.

トピック.授業外学習2:
Outside of class:
- For all class periods you will be required to complete homework assignments. This will include reading supplementary articles, vocabulary study, textbook assignments, writing responses and presentation templates, and presentation preparation. Be sure to attempt these assignments as they reinforce language, skills and assess knowledge of content covered in class.
- Review each lesson, and check any new content, language or skills learned.
- Access any online material required. Some assignments may involve online research.
- You should expect to spend about 1~2 hours doing homework per class period.
- Do not hesitate to contact me if you need any help, I'm happy to speak to you.
